reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Prof. Chen makes complex topics easy to understand and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but Dr. Williams can sometimes be unclear in her explanations.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is an excellent teacher. His problem-solving techniques are invaluable.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's passion for history is contagious. Her classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia seems knowledgeable, but his teaching style is too fast-paced for most students to follow.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez creates a welcoming classroom environment and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson assigns interesting readings, but his lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lab sessions are well-organized and her explanations are clear. Homework can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's real-world examples make economics come alive. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's enthusiasm for art is evident in every lecture. Sometimes goes off-topic, but always interesting.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson encourages deep thinking, but his assignments can be overly abstract and difficult.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's classes are engaging and thought-provoking. She presents balanced viewpoints on complex issues.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson seems disorganized and often arrives late to class. Explanations can be confusing.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. White brings current environmental issues into the classroom, making the course very relevant.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows his subject well, but can sometimes struggle to explain concepts clearly to non-math majors.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Martin is an outstanding educator. Her lectures are fascinating and she's always available for questions.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's industry experience adds valuable insights to the course. Group projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's course content is interesting, but her grading can be inconsistent and unclear at times.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's fieldwork experiences make for engaging lectures. Assignments encourage critical thinking.
